resources.string: Music Player activity, consists of song metadata, and action buttons to play/pause song as well as change tracks.
The Playlist activity displays the tracks from the selected Playlist. Click on the track to launch Music Player. Click on the Add button to add tracks to the Playlist
This is the Main Activity which lists the songs. Swipe for songs grouped as Playlists and for Favorites category. Click on the track to launch Music Player.
